name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Senior Golang Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, I focus on utilizing **Go**, alongside cloud platforms such as **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. My work incorporates **Kubernetes** for container orchestration and **Terraform** for Infrastructure as Code, ensuring scalable and resilient application deployment. I champion CI/CD practices and GitOps methodologies, leveraging version control with **Git** while optimizing Linux environments for performance and security.

I have successfully led the development of high-performance solutions in healthcare and financial sectors, integrating observability and security best practices. My expertise extends to building robust applications that adhere to compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Coupled with my strong problem-solving abilities, exceptional communication skills, and collaborative approach, I am dedicated to creating innovative solutions that drive business success.
